p: Multiple other treatments are currently under investigation. The following are a few examples: Darunavir/cobicistat (HIV-1 protease inhibitor): Eculizumab (humanized monoclonal IgG antibody against complement protein C5); Favipiravir (RNA polymerase inhibitor); Nelfinavir (HIV-1 protease inhibitor); Sarilumab (IL-6 receptor antagonist); Sofosbuvir (Antiviral used to treat hepatitis C); TZLS-501 (anti-IL6R); Vitamin C; Siltuximab (Sylvant®; a chimeric mAb that targets IL-6); Xuebijing (XBJ), ribonucleoside analog β-D-N4-hydroxycytidine (NHC, EIDD-1931); zinc sulfate [ 7, 69, [91], [92], [93]].
